subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: The IndyCar driver Ryan Hunter-Reay, who was involved in a crash at the Indianapolis 500 on Sunday, had surgery on his left thumb and will allow him to race Saturday at Texas.
snippet: The IndyCar driver Ryan Hunter-Reay, who was involved in a crash at the Indianapolis 500 on Sunday, had surgery on his left thumb and will allow him to race Saturday at Texas.
